about_the_game:
Streets of Rageness is a reimagined '90s beat 'em up classic set in a crime-ridden city under the iron grip of a ruthless syndicate. Amid rampant looting, chaos, and destruction, fight through waves of thugs to become the most powerful fighter on the streets!

About Streets of Rageness

Streets of Rageness takes the classic beat 'em up formula to a whole new level with immersive 3D environments and dynamic combat inspired by iconic fighting games like Street Fighter and Tekken. Step into the shoes of a diverse cast of street fighters, each with unique abilities and fighting styles, as you battle through a series of gritty, urban arenas.

Key Features

Master powerful punch and kick combos, unleash devastating special moves, and engage in fast-paced brawls against waves of ruthless enemies. The game offers a visceral, adrenaline-pumping experience that captures old-school arcade action with a fresh twist. Explore detailed cityscapes, conquer challenging bosses, and prove yourself as the ultimate street warrior in this homage to the classic Streets of Rage series.

content_descriptors.notes: Features violence in terms of combat action, but there is no blood or bad language involved.

detailed_description:
Join the fight club!

name: Streets of Rageness: Beat 'Em Up Fighter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.0 GHz and up
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9500 GT, VRAM: 256MB and up
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 and up
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 250, VRAM: 512MB and up
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews:
“Streets of Rageness captures the raw, chaotic fun of arcade beat 'em ups!”
Pixel Arcade

“It's a relentless brawler wrapped in a sleek 3D package for today's hardcore fighters!”
Hardcore Gamer

“It brings back the glory days of arcade brawlers with a fresh 3D twist!”
Gaming Warrior
short_description: Streets of Rageness is a reimagined '90s beat 'em up classic set in a crime-ridden city under the iron grip of a ruthless syndicate. Amid rampant looting, chaos, and destruction, fight through waves of thugs to become the most powerful fighter on the streets!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
